sn22.113:1.2: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha
sn22.113:1.4: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.113:1.6: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.113:1.7: “Mendicant, it’s when an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t understand form, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn22.113:1.11: consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn22.113:1.13: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
